title: Air quality related respiratory diseases in Pima County
excerpt: Huge mine trucks and other heavy trucks may soon face strict limits on how many can travel each day on unpaved county roads. The ordinance was pulled from the board's agenda before the department could make its presentation.
body: Dust and emissions from heavy vehicles can worsen air quality and respiratory outcomes, especially for children and seniors.
County officials continue to evaluate options for limiting traffic on unpaved roads near impacted communities.
SSSR is monitoring the issue and will share updates as new information becomes available.
